meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive George Kane Judy Miller Mark Wasley Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1590.

td.p: George Kane, an editor from Cambridge, Massachusetts
Judy Miller, an advertising executive from Fairfield, Connecticut
Mark Wasley, a computer consultant from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,200)

tr.td: WORLD LITERATURE
BEATLES LYRICS
FURNITURE
CATS
BIBLICAL QUOTES
WORDS WITHIN WORDS
